description.translate: Beautiful heavy steel, good elasticity at the ankles, a balanced weight on the toes.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Vagabondage dimensionnel\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Du bel acier bien lourd, une bonne élasticité aux chevilles,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7 un poids équilibré sur les orteils.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Beautiful heavy steel, good elasticity at the ankles,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7a balanced weight on the toes.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7RES§a1 §7HAS§a3 §7HER§c-1\"}"]}}
